UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Temporin-SHa and Its Analogs as Potential Candidates for the Treatment of Helicobacter pylori.
Literature.Author: Olleik H, Baydoun E, Perrier J, Hijazi A, Raymond J, Manzoni M, Dupuis L, Pauleau G, Goudard Y, Villeon B, Goin G, Sockeel P, Choudhary MI, Pasquale ED, Nadeem-Ul-Haque M, Ali H, Khan AI, Shaheen F, Maresca M

Literature.Title: Synthesis of Second-Generation Analogs of Temporin-SHa Peptide Having Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial and Anticancer Effects
Literature.Author: Khan AI, Nazir S, Haque MNU, Maharjan R, Khan FA, Olleik H, Courvoisier-Dezord E, Maresca M, Shaheen F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human Lung Fibroblasts IMR-90:IC50=33.0±3.1 µM,Human bronchial epithelial cells BEAS-2B:IC50=22.6±0.7 µM
